about_the_game:
On the game, you can choose your favorite weapon and you can destroy the city freely. Do you like rocket launcher? Okay, please! Or would you like C4? Yes, please use it. If you want to fly in the sky, there is also a jet pack! You can get points by destroying it. Let's boast to your friends!

disclaimer


To be honest this game is quite ridiculous and almost unfinished. It might be better to spend money on other things or to destroy real town with friends.

main Function


· You Can Become An Amazing Human.
· Let's destroy the city freely with rocket launcher and C4!
· Funny motion is a specification.
· Weapons like bugs

Future Development

We intend to realize the idea of the user as much as possible in order to make the game that everyone wants. For that, please send us many corrections and improvements by review and our Twitter. Please lend me your power to make even more amazing people!

My Twitter :

name: Amazing Human Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core2Duo that's all
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660 or RadeonHD7000 that's all
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ccore i3 that's all
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960 that's all
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Do you like destruction? Then let's enjoy destruction to the utmost!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
